name: Discord First Run File
summary: Learn about .FIRST-RUN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Discord stores its FIRST-RUN file in the following directory:
The file is always named .first-run, and it always contains only the word true.
NOTE: The Canary and Public Test Build versions of Discord also create and use a FIRST-RUN file.

instructions: While you can open a FIRST-RUN file with any text editor, you should not edit or alter the file's contents.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
